amendment.description: Amendment executes a liquidation of the Federal Reserve surplus account and remittance of funds to the U.S. Treasury; dissolves the existence of the surplus account on a go-forward basis; and ensures that future net earnings of the Federal Reserve, in excess of dividend paid, are remitted to the U.S. Treasury.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 18 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to execute a liquidation of the Federal Reserve surplus account and remittance of funds to the U.S. Treasury. Amendment also dissolves the existence of the surplus account on a go-forward basis and ensures that future net earnings of the Federal Reserve, in excess of dividend paid, are remitted to the U.S. Treasury.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A091) Agreed to by recorded vote: 354 - 72 (Roll no. 622).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A091) Agreed to by recorded vote: 354 - 72 (Roll no. 622).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A091) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
